intro: Ainsliaea lalashanensis, commonly known as the Lalashan ainsliaea, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its showy, clustered flowers that are typically pink or white. The plant has slender stems and heart-shaped leaves, which are often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
